topic.topicTitle: Editing multiple accounts using the Import function
topic.topicDialog:
On Kerboodle, you can use the export and re-import feature to edit multiple Student and Teacher accounts, rather than editing them individually.

Using this option, you can edit the Username, Password, First Name, Last Name, Email Address, Year, Class, User Type and Enable or Disable the account (using the Active column).

If you'd like to delete multiple accounts or set multiple Students and Teachers as leavers or restore them, please have a look at the Editing Multiple Accounts On-Screen tutorial.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Switch to Admin mode button at the top of the screen and re-enter your password to access the Admin area.
Choose the option to Export and Re-import.
The Import Wizard will take you through the process step-by-step until you have successfully edited your student accounts.
The changes will then be applied to the accounts immediately.
